item.description:
So this is a New Year! Let's begin fresh with only good thoughts and make sure we're being mindful to keep these fore front in our heads. We'll watch part of a movie and follow with discussion.

It will be great to see everyone and hope some of the newbies can join us :) See you soon!---Caryn

 

PS. There will be a slight donation of a few dollars to help pay for expenses. Thx.

 

Hi Everyone, I wanted to change the date to following Wednesday as there is a big event in Portland that I totally forgot about and was going to attend. I am so sorry for any inconvenience and look forward to seeing everyone on Feb 1st if you can come.  Just leave your RSVP up if you can still come :)

 Here is the info if interested that I'm attending and I hear he's very inspirational!

See you 2/1/12!


January 25th, 7pm   BEGIN   DOING  
Merrill Auditorium

Special BUY-1-GET-1-FREE with code AA2012
Who is Andy Andrews? Andy coaches Fortune 500 companies including Bank of America, State Farm, AT&T, Honda, Trader Joe's, and the US Air Force.  He has spoken at the request of 4 different U.S. Presidents.  Pro-athletes call Andy Andrews when they find themselves in a rut.  He has 7 Secrets that he shares with his top clients, and will be sharing with a select group at Merrill Auditorium in Portland on January 25th.  He normally speaks in front of 20,000 people; there are only 1800 seats at this event.  Spend 2 hours with the man who coaches the elite and learn what they learn.

WATCH THIS VIDEO:

www.begindoing.com


FOR TICKETS:  www.porttix.com or 207-842-0800 or in person at the Merrill Auditorium box office (20 Myrtle St, Portland)

Tired of not making enough money?  Tired of not having enough time? If you don't change, nothing will change.  BEGIN DOING what you want to do NOW!  follow on Twitter | friend on Facebook | forward to a friend  Copyright © 2012 BEGIN DOING, All rights reserved.

item.how_to_find_us: I'll send you address when you sign up!
item.name: Let's talk about what we want to manifest in the New Year and welcome newcomers!
